DOC.brief_summary: To determine the overall objective response rate of pegylated liposomal doxorubicin （Lipo-Dox）combined with cyclophosphamide/5-FU as second-line treatment in patients with metastatic breast cancer.
DOC.brief_title: Lipo-dox and Cyclophosphamide /5-Fluorouracil in Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: histologically proved breast cancer with metastatic disease life expectancy less than 3 months.
